text: Leonardo Vinci Ifigenia in Tauride is an opera in five acts composed by Leonardo Vinci to a libretto by Benedetto Pasqualigo. It premiered on 26 December 1724 at the Teatro San Giovanni Grisostomo in Venice, with Faustina Bordoni in the title role. The opera was Vinci's first success in Venice and his only five-act opera. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Operas Category:1724 operas Category:Operas by Leonardo Vinci Category:Italian- language operas Category:Operas based on works by Euripides Category:Operas based on Greco-Roman mythology
title: Ifigenia in Tauride (Vinci)
